trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs" /> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il metodo che gestisce l'evento <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding" /> di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> metodo appena prima di aggiungere un controllo a una zona Web part.

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento fornisce la possibilità di annullare il processo prima del completamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> eventi viene chiamato dopo l'aggiunta di un controllo a una zona Web part.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventHandler> delegate is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo specificato nella <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventHandler> delegato viene chiamato quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> viene generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Gli sviluppatori di pagine possono fornire gestori personalizzati per l'evento mediante l'aggiunta di `OnWebPartAdding` attributo il `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento in una pagina e assegnando un nome di metodo personalizzato per l'attributo.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Un gestore personalizzato può essere assegnato anche a livello di codice.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'assegnazione di un gestore eventi a livello di codice, vedere [NIB: procedura: connettere i metodi del gestore eventi agli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
